result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Steven Marcus Hunt Jr
Current: 520 Hamilton St. #2, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 03-10-2015)
Prior: 520 Hamilton St #4, Wausau, WI 54403

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 2:02 pm 
INCLUDES 14CM2010, 15CM188, AND 15CM189. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Def appears in person, pro se.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to: 
In 14CM2010: Ct. 1 (Operating w/out valid dl)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM189: Ct. 1 (Operating w/out valid dl)>>D&RI. 
                     : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: 
In 15CM188: Ct. 1 (Operating w/out valid dl)>>GUILTY. 
                     : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>GUILTY. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, def is competent to represent self, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: On Ct. 1 >> $5 plus costs and On Ct. 2>> costs. 
COURT gives def 60 days to pay or payment plan
Adj: 2:12 pm

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 9:28 am 
INCLUDES 14CM2010, 15CM188, AND 15CM189. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft appears in person, pro se. 
COURT questions deft regarding missed court appearance. 
State requests some bond forfeiture. 
COURT enters judgment of $100. 
COURT notes jury trial on 2/24/2015 at 9am. 
COURT questions deft regarding counsel. Deft states he does not intend to have counsel. 
COURT provides deft with waiver of counsel form and advises deft to review and complete form prior to next court appearance. 
Bond Continues. 
Adj: 9:31 am
INCLUDES 15CM189, 15CM188, & 14CM2010 Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.
